title: NHS Grampian Networked Data Lab Manual
text:
Welcome
We’ve gathered up best practice for data science in the NHS. Use the menu on the left to navigate.

Our guiding principles
Our team follows the Government’s recommendations on Modern, open working methods for NHS data

Build, don’t buy
Analysts are coders
Work by reproducible analytical pipelines
Open code, analysis and research
Grow talent and create a modern profession
